TenDRA 4.1.2 release.
This document describes &tspec; version 2. &tspec; 2 contains significant changes from previous releases. For convenience the main changes which are visible to the &tspec; user are listed here.

The added specification level of named subsets of headers has been introduced (see ). This has been done by introducing the +SUBSET construct and extending the +IMPLEMENT and +USE constructs, as well as the command-line options. The previous method of dealing with such subsets - namely shared headers - is now obsolete and its use is discouraged.
A number of new command-line options have been added, and some of the existing options have been modified slightly.
The suffix .api has been added to the output directories (see ) to avoid possible confusion with other include file directories.
The use of identifiers beginning with ~ as local variables is new (see ).
The (extern), (weak) and (const) qualifiers for +FUNC and +EXP (see and ) are new.
The ~special type constructor (see ) is new.
The ~abstract type constructor has been abandoned.
The +BASE_API command described in is new.
